ns1:ProposalItem.ns1:ProposalText: Scope: Constitutional Amendment Article X, Section 19 Title: California Transportation Initiative For Statewide Solor Powered Magnetic Levitation System Description: To reduce traffic and increase travel alternatives, this amendment provides for development of a high speed solor powered magnetic levitation system to run along Interstate 5. Construction to begin November 1, 2004.

Scope: Constitutional Amendment Article XII, Section 10 Title: California Universal Health Care Description: To improve accessibility to quality health care and to reduce overall health care costs, this amendment provides for the establishment of a signle payer Health Care System for all Californians. Implementation to take effect 1/1/05.

Scope: Charter Amendment Referendum No. 1 Title: Two Term Limit for County Commissioners Description: Shall the Santa Clara County Charter be amended to add Article II, Section 2.2: A provisions limiting Commissioners to two terms?
